% Template for a research diary generated from the git log.
%
% You don't have to edit this file. Your name and the log entries will be
% generated by the Makefile and inserted into auxiliary files (diary_author.tex
% and diary_entries.tex).

\documentclass[11pt,a4paper]{article}
% Full Unicode support for non-ASCII characters
\usepackage[utf8]{inputenc}
% Typographical rules for English
\usepackage[english]{babel}
% Set the borders of the page
\usepackage[left=15mm,right=15mm,top=30mm,bottom=30mm]{geometry}
% Include links and metadata in PDFs
\usepackage[pdftex,colorlinks=true]{hyperref}
% Define command to insert month name and year as date
\usepackage{datetime}
% Nice styling for headers and footers
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\usepackage{multicol}
% To control the style of section titles
\usepackage{sectsty}
\usepackage{titlesec}

% Decrease the spacing between sections
\titlespacing{\section}{0pt}{1.5pc}{0.4pc}

% Configure the font style for sections
\sectionfont{\bfseries\fontsize{12pt}{0}\selectfont}

% Set the spacing between columns
\setlength{\columnsep}{1cm}

% Remove indentation of paragraphs
\setlength{\parindent}{0pt}

% Increase spacing between paragraphs
\setlength{\parskip}{8pt}

% Define some variables for use later
\newcommand{\Title}{Research Diary}

% The name of the author is defined in this external file that is automatically
% generated by the Makefile
\input{diary_author}

% Setup metadata for the PDF and link colour
\hypersetup{
    pdftitle={\Title},
    pdfauthor={\Name},
    pdfsubject={Log of research activities undertaken throughout the project.},
    linkcolor=black,
    citecolor=black,
    filecolor=black,
    urlcolor=blue
}

% Set fancy headers
\usepackage{fancyhdr}
\pagestyle{fancy}
\fancyhf{}
\chead{\fontsize{9pt}{0}\selectfont\itshape \Title{} -- \Name{}}
\lhead{}
\rhead{\fontsize{9pt}{0}\selectfont \thepage}
\cfoot{}
\renewcommand{\headrulewidth}{0pt}

\begin{document}

  \thispagestyle{plain}

  \begin{center}
    {\LARGE\Title{} -- \Name{}}
  \end{center}

  \vspace{0.5cm}

  \begin{multicols*}{2}
    \input{diary_entries}
  \end{multicols*}

\end{document}
